name: TangSengRou(Meat of Tang Sanzang)
description:
left/right to move, space to use dagger.

One week assignment from Prototype Studio, under given prompt "Journey to the West". 

After re-read a bit of Monkey King: Journey to the West as a grown up, I wondered, who told those monster that they can eat Tangsanzang's meat for eternal youth?

Instructor: Bennett Foddy
